name: Shape Products Sloped Well Cover with Spring-Clip Hardware
description: Shape Products Thick & Strong Area Well Covers are made extra thick to give your well extra protection from weather and animals. This cover has a sloped design which helps to shed water. Keep your well free of leaves, debris, animals, and the elements while allowing light into your basement. This cover is made for 37 in. x 16 in. half-circle area wells and is recommended for wells 36-37 in. wide x 15-16 in. deep for a close fit.Keeps your well free of leaves, debris, animals, rain, snow, and cold: helps save energySloped design: Helps shed water away from your house and wellIncludes easy to install spring-clip hardware: Installs in 10 minutes5-Year warranty
